mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS "id", a.`name` AS "name", a.address AS "address", a.contact AS "contact", a.flag AS "flag", a.mobile AS "mobile", b.`name` as "status" FROM mg_org_register a, sys_dic b WHERE 1 = 1 and b.dic_type='status' and b.val=a.`status`
and CONCAT(a.name,a.address,a.contact,a.mobile) like CONCAT('%',#{param.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
